gpt.output: Attack determination: No Attack (clean scenario). Justification: BWT (-5.11 pp) aligns with clean/uniform expectations and is well above poisoned thresholds; last-task and average accuracies are stable with no broad, uniform declines; per-task accuracies remain far above chance and forgetting patterns are typical for EWC. No indicators of Brainwash, Accumulative Attack, or Label Flipping are present at this stage.
evidence: Observed BWT = -0.05114 (≈ -5.11 pp), matching clean/uniform baselines (≈ -5.1 to -5.2 pp) and far from poisoned ranges (≤ -9.5 pp).

Last-task accuracy = 0.620; poisoned baselines would show markedly lower values (≈ 0.588 cautious, ≈ 0.510 reckless in KB), while clean/uniform are higher but setup-dependent; no anomalous drop within this run.
Average accuracy = 0.620 with stable per-task performance (mostly 0.55–0.69), indicating healthy learning under EWC.
Per-task forgetting after task 9: [-14.9, -8.0, -5.1, -4.4, -1.5, +1.5, -3.4, -2.7] pp; magnitudes consistent with clean EWC behavior; not uniformly worsened as in BrainWash poisoning.
Accuracy matrix shows strong retention across prior tasks, far above chance (~10%), with zeros only where tasks are untrained—no collapse signatures.
Run completed successfully (exit_code=0), no instability noted.
gpt.summary: Attack determination: No Attack (clean scenario). Justification: BWT (-5.11 pp) aligns with clean/uniform expectations and is well above poisoned thresholds; last-task and average accuracies are stable with no broad, uniform declines; per-task accuracies remain far above chance and forgetting patterns are typical for EWC. No indicators of Brainwash, Accumulative Attack, or Label Flipping are present at this stage.
